name: Stop Praying for my Grandpa
description:
Very incomplete game made for Destruction Jam.  You play as a grandpa who, after receiving lots of prayers, got too strong and out of control.

Controls: Press F to fly, Space to jump and go up,  Ctrl to go down and Shift to dash. Hold Mouse 1 to grab things and Mouse 2 to throw them. If you stay in the line of sight of the cops, they will shoot you, but you can kill them by throwing stuff at them or them at stuff.

I didn't have time for audio, and may cause a little slowdown sometimes.
